name: Temple Square
description: The main square of the town. People come and go. East is a donation room, south is the marketplace.

name: Donation Room
description: Donations for needy adventurers can be found here.

name: Market Square
description: The center of town, where people come to trade. To the east is the general store.

name: General Store
description: Empty shelves, empty counters. A store might be here some day, but not today.

name: South Gate
description: The gate to the southern wastes.
